discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
The name seems fine to me. It will need a manual merge, of course, so post a message in the `#pkg-registration` channel on Slack after the three-day waiting period ends.

It might be good to make the text "Rete algorithm" in the README a link to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rete_algorithm or whatever website you think provides the best explanation of the method implemented in this package.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
Oh, you do need to fix

> The compat entry for julia is unbounded.

before this can be merged.
